page.title: 20Clubs
page.content: A variety of organisations and leisure groups exist to support the life in the village- many under the wing of the Church. Support is given to a{Christian {Community in Southern India {(Prakaspuram)}through both prayer and finance. A{playgroup}and{toddlers}group meet in the 15th century Church House, as do the{Women's Institute,}the{British {Legion}and the{Cricket Club. There is much{hunting}with the Staghounds and Foxhounds. Much support is given by residents of the village to many fund raising activities held to raise money for the Childrens' Christmas Party, Firework Display (November 5th), the Senior Citizens' Outing and the Church Fete and Harvest Supper.
